data.title: Carine Roitfeld’s Remarkable Fashion Career | Inside Fashion
data.meta_description: Listen to this episode from The Business of Fashion Podcast on Spotify. The acclaimed stylist and editor, whose name has become synonymous with French style, talks to Imran Amed about how the industry has changed since her days at French Vogue, working with Karl Lagerfeld, becoming a brand and the importance of staying curious. Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews. Ready to become a BoF Professional?
